name: Aqua Rose
loreDescription: This rose of eternal beauty grants great magical power to the possessor.

skillDescription.base: 50% chance to grant a barrier to the caster equivalent to 5.0% of max Health for 1 turn when attacked. Can only grant once every 2 turns.
skillDescription.max: 50% chance to grant a barrier to the caster equivalent to 10.0% of max Health for 1 turn when attacked. Can only grant once every 2 turns.
